attributes.action: Spread more mental health awareness in schools and youth centres
attributes.additional_details: This will help for schools and youth centres to encourage their students to talk about mental health issues and not suffer alone
attributes.background: I want to do this petition because as a person who has faced some depression and bullying before I feel that I should have talked out and I feel that many children do this while they feel isolated and lost with no guidance or anyone to talk to.

rejection.details:
We understand that are you are concerned about mental health awareness among young people, but we aren't sure what you would like the UK Government or Parliament to do about it.

You might like to sign one or more of these petitions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/227257

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/231146

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/228717

You could also start a new petition setting out the action you would like taken. For example, if you would like the UK Government to fund mental health services in youth centres you could start a petition about that.

You'll need to give your full name to start a petition.
